title: In my super special secret shop
body: So I'm 4 RP short for the GP skin in my store, can I please have please???

replies.body: Sure thing, but imma have to ask for your best drawing of a poro first! Doesn't need to be good, lord knows I'm a terrible artist xD

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JsakPG9B,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-22T02:19:32.802+0000)
>
> Sure thing, but imma have to ask for your best drawing of a poro first! Doesn't need to be good, lord knows I'm a terrible artist xD

[My best poro bro](https://imgur.com/a/5tbk6)

HE'S SO FLUFFY!!!!!

Double check your account, you should see that 4 RP added ^_^

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JsakPG9B,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2017-09-22T02:50:26.935+0000)
>
> HE'S SO FLUFFY!!!!!
> 
> Double check your account, you should see that 4 RP added ^_^
Thank you, and thank you {{summoner:30}} 

I wasn't sure if it would qualify for a drawing let alone a poro {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
